question: Who recently broke West Indian Steve Bucknorâ€™s record of umpiring in most number of Test matches?
explanation: Aleem Dar broke Steve Bucknor\'s record of umpiring in most number of Tests. Pakistan\'s Aleem Dar on December 12,2019 surpassed Steve Bucknor\'s record for officiating in most number of Test matches as an umpire during the first Test of the three-match series between Australia and New Zealand at the Perth Stadium.
